provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Road Traffic (Amendment) Short title
 (No. 2) Act, 2002 and shall be read and construed as one with the 5,,,,c».
 Road Traffic Act (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act) and
  all amendments thereto.                                              Amendment
                                                                       of section I 5

provisions.content:
2. Section 15 of the principal Act is amended-
         (a) in the marginal note, by inserting next after the word ?'P""

              Maintenance Fund";
  2              [No. 38]           The Road Traffic (Amendment) Act, 2002
                        (b) by deleting from subsection (I) the words "subsection
                               (2)" and substituting therefor the words "subsections
                               (2) and (3)"; and
                        (c) by inserting next after subsection (2) the following as
                            subsection (3)
                           "    (3) An amount equivalent to 33¥ per cent of licence
                duties on motor vehicles shall be paid into or accrue to the Road
                Maintenance Fund established under the Road Maintenance Fund
                Act.".
